channel.title: 317 KarmaScape PVP | GWD bosses | Skill+PK based economy | Great Community
channel.description:
[center][SIZE=4][URL=http://"http://karmascape.net/"]Website[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://karmascape.net/downloads.php"]Client Download[/URL] |[URL=http://"http://forums.karmascape.net/"]Forums[/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][b]Features[/b][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Kalphite, KBD, Dag Kings, Chaos Elemental, All God Wars Bosses [*]Custom PK Weapons: KarmaGlock, Godsabers [*]Working D Claws [*]Working Vengeance + Anim [*]Turmoil + Soul Split [*]Prestige System (Reset your combat stats and you can go 5 levels over 99! [*]PK Armor (Statius, Zuriel, Vesta, Morrigan) [*]Spirit Shields [*]Chaotic Weapons [*]Custom Quest [*]Clan Chat [*]Custom Interfaces (Top ten pkers, welcome screen)[/ul]
